title: You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time.
body: It was my birthday and I redeemed a lot of cards. I know I have to wait 24 hours, but will it reset every time I try to put in the code again?

replies.body: You'll want to wait **at LEAST** 24 hours before trying to make any more purchases. The timer will lock you out for the full day, and if you try again before that time is up it will restart the timer. At this point I would try waiting 2 days, and if you have any problems then reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Why does it do that without telling us, i didnt know exactly what time it was so i could've done it a minute before the timer was up and now i have to wait another 24 hours? Dumb.
